languages.text: The character becomes immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} that reduce their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They gain +{uip|MovementPoints|e2feb6faef0d404e874f07b3ed51a888} MP.

traits.locale_text: The character becomes immune to all effects that reduce their movement points. They gain +<u>(Toughness bonus / 2)</u> movement points.
